title: Banana Hit Black Nicotine Pouches by Cuba
description: TRY CUBA BANANA HIT BLACK NICOTINE POUCHES CUBA Banana Hit Black is an experience of lush sweetness that envelops your senses delightfully and uniquely. CUBA Banana Hit Black nicotine pouches offer an extremely strong nicotine hit that will satisfy even the most seasoned users. Each nicotine pouch demonstrates CUBA's craftsmanship and innovation View all Cuba Pouches View all Dessert Pouches View all Fruity Pouches View all Extra Strong Pouches KEY FEATURES: 66MG Per Gram | 43MG Per Pouch Banana-flavoured nicotine pouches Refreshing tingling sensation with each pouch Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free Discreet and suitable for all occasions MORE ABOUT BANANA FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES Cuba Banana Hit Black offers the familiar taste of bananas transformed into an exhilaratingly icy sensation for a tropical and revitalizing experience. This pouch is one of the boldest options available, packed with nicotine. MORE ABOUT CUBA NICOTINE POUCHES Cuba is manufactured by Nicotobacco, one of the leading suppliers of nicotine pouches in Poland. Nicotobacco also manufactures Cuba sister brand Baron. Cuba offers a range of mint flavours. Additional Description Information: Brand Name: Cuba Product Type: Nicotine Pouches Pouch Format: Slim Our Strength Rating: Extra Strong Nicotine per Pouch 43 MG Nicotine per Gram 66 MG Flavour Name: Banana Black Flavour: Fruit Pouches per can: 20 Shipping from: London, UK
